text: The 2015 Bethune–Cookman Wildcats baseball team represents Bethune-Cookman University in the sport of baseball during the 2015 college baseball season. The Wildcats competed in Division I of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) and the Southern Division of the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference (MEAC). The team is coached by Jason Beverlin, who is entering his fifth season at Bethune-Cookman. ==Roster== {| class="toccolours" style="border-collapse:collapse; font-size:90%;" |- | colspan=9 style=""|
